definition[0]: to produce an idea, name, suggestion etc by thinking
example[0]: They’re still trying to think of a name for the baby.
example[1]: Can you think of any other way to do it?
example[2]: I can’t think of the name of the hotel we stayed in.
definition[2]: to behave in a way that shows that you want to treat other people well
example[3]: It was very good of you to think of me.
example[4]: He’s always thinking of other people.
definition[3]: to only do things that are good for you and not think about what other people want – used to show disapproval
example[5]: She’s a spoiled child who thinks only of herself.
definition[4]: used to say that you care about and feel sympathy for someone who is in a difficult situation
example[6]: Take care! I’ll be thinking of you.
